bill_title: to provide for the issuance of big game licenses to certain landowners and operators free of charge.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the issuance of big game licenses to certain landowners and operators free of charge. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any resident farmer or rancher who owns or leases the prescribed minimum acreage of farm or ranch land to qualify for landowner preference and who actually resides on such land or is an owner-operator of such land may be issued free of charge any deer license for which the farmer or rancher qualifies. No more than two licenses may be issued free of charge under this section to any farm or ranch household for an applicable deer season. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
